name: Star Harvest (SquarePegStudios)
description:
Squarepegstudios' physics action platformer Star Harvest puts you in space as you fend off hostile alien life from Imperial Space Stations equipped with a grappling hook and a rocket boosters. Swing from planets and jump onto fully destructible space stations where you must wipe out the alien threat and restore peace to the Imperial Star System using a variety of powerful firearms and gadgets.

#shooter #scifi #horror #action #platformer #arcade #space #physics
